markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Tiefling](/Traits.aspx?ID=258)</title>

**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 270 <sup>2.0</sup>

A creature with this trait has the tiefling versatile heritage. Tieflings are [planar scions](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=81) descended from [fiends](/Traits.aspx?ID=70). An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by tieflings.
name: Tiefling
